category.pattern: WHAT ARE THE SYMPTOMS OF COVID 19
category.template: Some common Symptoms of COVID-19 are fever, dry cough, tiredness, loss of taste and smell.
Current evidence suggests that COVID-19 spreads between people through direct, indirect, or close contact with infected people via mouth and nose secretions.

category.pattern: HOW TO PREVENT THE SPREAD OF COVID 19
category.template: To prevent the spread of COVID-19, clean your hands often, maintain social distancing, wear a mask whenever in close physical proximity and seek medical attention whenever necessary.

category.pattern: WHEN WILL VACCINATION START IN INDIA
category.template: The first phase of vaccination will start in India on 16th January, 2021.

category.pattern: NAME A VACCINE AGAINST COVID 19 IN INDIA
Where did Covid 19 first originate from
category.template: COVID-19 is said to have first originated in early December, 2019 in China, in the wholesale food market in Wuhan.

category.pattern: WHO IS THE MOST AT RISK OF SEVERE ILLNESS FROM COVID 19
category.template: People aged 60 years and over, and those with underlying medical problems like high blood pressure, heart and lung problems, diabetes, obesity or cancer, are at higher risk of developing serious illness.

category.pattern: WHICH COUNTRY HAS THE HIGHEST NUMBER OF COVID 19 CASES
category.template: United States of America has the highest number of COVID-19 cases till date.

I can do the following things for you: 1)Find hospitals near you 2)Remember a thing you said to me 3)Give you covid stats (Globally/Country Wise) 4)Search anything on wikipedia and display the results here itself 5)Change input medium(voice to text and vice versa) 6)Provide you deatils about symptoms and precautions and vaccines on covid-19 7)Provide you other useful information regarding covid-19 8)Show you the correct way of washing hands 9)Run a health checkup for you 10)Last but not the least, talk as a friend with you.

category.pattern: WHAT ALL CAN YOU DO FOR ME
WHAT WAS THE THING I HAD ASKED YOU TO REMEMBER
category.template: You had asked me to remember

category.template: Just chill dude, do not worry so much!

Full of energy and ready to help
